text: maa ahdrt 'iiblis wadhuriyatah -aldhyn atetmwhm- khalq alsmwat walard, fasteyn bihim ealaa khlqhma, wala ashhdt bedhm ealaa khalq bed, bal tfrdt bikhalq jmye dhlk, bighayr mueayan wala zhyr, wama kunt mutakhidh almdllin min alshayatin wghyrhm aewanana. fkyf tusrafun 'iilayhim hqy, wttkhdhwnhm 'awlia' min dwny, wa'ana khaliq kuli shy'?
